title: The Rise and Potential of Large Language Model Based Agents: A Survey

sections.description: Introduce the topic of large language model-based agents, emphasizing their significance in natural language processing and artificial intelligence. Discuss the transformative impact these models have on technology and communication. Include a subsection 'Structure of the Survey' to outline the organization of the paper.
